Oper

Verglilius Maro, Publius. Opera.

Milan: Leonardus Pachel and Uldericus Scinzenzeler, 1487
fo.
ISTC iv00179000 Goff V179; C 6056; Davies &Goldfinch 57; C(IVir) 64; Mambelli 57; Pell Ms 11633; CIBN V-130; Péligry 792; IGI 10210; Sajó-Soltész 3454; GW M49835

 

Shelf-mark:   Aitchison D1  
Provenance:   Gift from Robert Aitchison.  
Binding:   1954 rebound.  
Annotations:   Single word or short-phrase marginalia and some underlining.  
Decoration:   none.  
Imperfections:   Some stains, mostly minor. ​
